## Forcats

```{r}
library(forcats)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)

#help("forcats")

starwars %>% 
  filter(!is.na(species)) %>%
  count(species, sort = TRUE)

ggplot(starwars, aes(x = eye_color)) + 
  geom_bar() + 
  coord_flip()

starwars %>%
  mutate(eye_color = fct_infreq(eye_color)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = eye_color)) + 
  geom_bar() + 
  coord_flip()
```
